suggestions.reason: Posture recovery is most commonly needed when opponent is in closed guard and has broken your posture down.
De La Riva Sweep originates from De La Riva Guard, which is a specific type of open guard bottom position
Leg Lock Control is a submission control position that directly leads to winning by submission when successfully executed.
Guard Retention is the defensive complement to Counter Sweep - both involve recognizing and defending against sweep attempts.
Pressure Pass directly establishes Side Control as its completion state, making this the primary destination position.
Kosoto Gari is a takedown that commonly ends in Side Control Top, making this the primary position to link.
Knee Tap is a takedown technique that begins from neutral/standing position, making this the primary starting state.
Standing up in base directly transitions from turtle to top position, making this the primary destination state.
The butterfly pass explicitly transitions to side control as its finishing position, making this the primary destination state.
Directly demonstrates a specific type of position change with detailed execution steps and success rates.
Guard passing typically culminates in side control as explicitly mentioned in the execution sequence and completion step.
Knee slice pass directly transitions to side control as the ending position of this technique
Butterfly guard and closed guard are closely related guard positions that often transition between each other, making this a natural related position
Deashi Harai is a standing technique executed from neutral position, which is the natural starting state for this throw
Deep half guard is a key guard retention position, making this transition directly relevant to maintaining guard when passing pressure occurs.
Ippon Seoi Nage is a standing throw that transitions directly to Side Control Top as the dominant landing position.
Single Leg Entry explicitly starts from standing position, making this the primary starting state for this transition.
The bodylock pass completes in side control, making this the primary destination position from this transition
Spider Guard Pass explicitly states it results in side control as the ending position, making this the primary destination of the technique.
Granby Roll is a primary technique for recovering guard position, making this a fundamental position-to-transition relationship.
Pendulum Sweep is a fundamental technique executed from Closed Guard Bottom position, which is the primary starting position for this sweep.

instructions.task: Apply these wikilink suggestions to markdown files
reporting: Report line numbers where links added
